body.p: The Board noted that the arrangements described in paragraph BC268B are

li.p: for the purpose of providing benefits to the employees of the subsidiary in return for employee services, and

body.p: In addition, the Board noted that the guidance in paragraph 3 (now superseded by paragraph 3A) already stated that when a shareholder transferred equity instruments of the entity (or another group entity), the transaction would be within the scope of IFRS 2 for the entity receiving the goods or services.
